title: Flamingo Fatale
description: After a full day slinging hash at Kountry Kitchen and then surviving the graveyard shift at Budget Mart, the last thing Wanda Nell Culpepper needs is to to find her no-account ex-husband, Bobby Ray, flashing cash and stirring up trouble. Things can't get much worseâ€”until the next day when she finds her missing pink flamingo stuck in his very dead body.
author: Jimmie Ruth Evans
